full_summary:
# Enterprise Agile Solution RFP

## Brief Description
RFP ID: PW-22-01018314, Solicitation Number: 2022-AG-013, Effective Date: 2022-12-21
The Government of Canada is soliciting proposals for an Enterprise Agile Solution through a non-binding, competitive RFP, with the contract completion anticipated for Canada.

## Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this RFP is Farm Credit Canada, a Crown corporation with a long history of providing financing services for the agriculture and food industry in Canada.

## RFP Overview
The RFP seeks a Proponent to provide a day-to-day delivery/management tool as well as an enterprise-wide agile planning and reporting tool to support the implementation of a Product Centric delivery approach based on the Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe). The ideal Enterprise Agile tool is expected to be industry-leading, intuitive for users, and provide capabilities for enterprise-to-enterprise planning, tracking, adjustment, and management of programs and products.

## RFP Structure
The RFP process will consist of the following stages:

*   **Proponent Questions and Responses**: Proponents may submit questions until January 9, 2023, with FCC's responses to these questions delivered before January 18, 2023.
*   **RFP Closing and Evaluation**: The RFP will close on January 25, 2023, with the evaluation process to follow.
*   **Contract Award and Performance**: The Performance and Evaluation criteria will form a part of any subsequent contract between the Government of Canada and the successful Proponent.

## Important Notes
*   The use of standardised records and data exchange protocols and processes, particularly with respect to data returned to the Government of Canada, shall be required at all times.
*   Proponents are expected to provide, and the Government of Canada to receive, pre-approval documentation as required. Copies of certified examples of this would be required.

## Contact Information
Any questions or clarification regarding the RFP may be sought from the designated contact below:

Gottselig, Adam
Procurement and Vendor Manager
Facility Name: Farm Credit Canada
Location: Regina, Saskatchewan, S4P 4L3, Canada
Phone: Not Provided
Email: [procurement@fcc.ca](mailto:procurement@fcc.ca)

Proponents interested in receiving a copy of the RFP document must request access via the designated contact. Note: this process is separate from the Goods and Services Ontario (GSO) online
